title: Loving Hut - Radlicka
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, Asian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and desserts. Quick service style. Self serve buffet weekdays 11am-4pm.
